message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $950,000. This is the most I can afford at this time.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but it's still a bit lower than what I'm hoping for. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000,  considering your interest. This would still be a great deal for you, given the value of the product. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,000,000. This is the highest I can go while staying within my budget.
